name: Tharie Organic Cotton Yoga Strap, GOTS Certified, Adjustable D-Ring, Soft & Durable Stretching Strap for Yoga, Pilates & Physical Therapy, 250 cm
short_description: ORGANIC COTTON & DURABLE BUILD - Made from 100% organic cotton with reinforced stitching and a sturdy metal D-ring for reliable support during stretching and mobility exercises. Designed for long-term daily use without irritation.

HYPOALLERGENIC & SKIN-FRIENDLY - Undyed, breathable cotton is gentle on the skin and suitable for sensitive users. Free from synthetic materials, making it comfortable for extended holds and repeated practice.

SUPPORTS SAFE STRETCHING & FLEXIBILITY - Helps assist deeper stretches and improved range of motion for hips, hamstrings, shoulders, and joints. The adjustable length allows controlled, unassisted stretching at your own pace.

VERSATILE FOR YOGA, PILATES & PHYSICAL THERAPY - Ideal for yoga, Pilates, flexibility training, posture support, and rehabilitation exercises. Suitable for beginners and experienced practitioners looking for added stability and alignment.
PRACTICAL SIZE & EASY CARE - Measures 98 x 1.5 inches (L x W) and weighs 0.44 lbs. Lightweight, portable, and washable for easy maintenance at home or in the studio.
product_description: Tharie's premium stretching strap is crafted from 100% GOTS-certified organic cotton of the highest quality, offering a durable, eco-friendly option to enhance your yoga, Pilates, and stretching practice. The strap provides perfect support for deepening stretches, improving flexibility, and assisting with posture. It is also beneficial for physiotherapy, post-op recovery, and general fitness, helping to enhance hip, knee, and ligament flexibility while avoiding injury. Its adjustable length ensures comfort for all body types, and the soft cotton material is gentle on the skin, making it ideal for daily use. Whether you're a beginner or advanced practitioner, this versatile strap is perfect for enhancing your range of motion, holding poses longer, and offering extra support during workouts. Lightweight, durable, and easy to care for, it’s a must-have accessory for any wellness routine. Crafted in India with love, each strap is designed to support your journey to greater flexibility and well-being while promoting sustainability.
product_details: Style ‎Simple, non-dyed organic cotton in natural color.

name: Gaiam Yoga Strap Premium Athletic Stretch Band with Adjustable Metal D-Ring Buckle Loop | Exercise & Fitness Stretching for Yoga, Pilates, Physical Therapy, Dance, Gym Workouts
short_description: YOGA STRAP: An essential yoga accessory and prop to help you deepen stretches and improve flexibility while allowing your shoulders to relax for proper alignment - if you feel tight, grab a strap and don’t risk injury by over-extending

STRETCH STRAP: Use the strap to reach limbs more easily on challenging positions and to hold poses and stretches for longer - take your practice to the next level by using a yoga strap to deepen and extend stretches to gain more flexibility

ADJUSTABLE METAL D-RING BUCKLE: Features an easy-release double ring metal cinch buckle that allows you to shorten the strap and to make a secure loop band that is secure and will not budge so that you can concentrate on your stretching without slipping

DURABLE FABRIC BLEND: Straps are constructed of a durable high-quality fabric blend of polyester that will not fray or break and is made to last you for years to come - easily rolls up and fits in your yoga mat bag or tote
product_description: Experience the mind-body satisfaction of flexing beyond your usual limits with a yoga strap. Allow yourself to expand your range, achieve more challenging positions and sustain poses for longer periods of time. Deepen your stretches and extend your reach while allowing your shoulders to relax. The easy-release cinch buckle holds the strap securely in place. If you feel tight, grab a strap and don’t risk injury by over-extending. Straps are constructed of a durable high-quality fabric blend of polyester that will not fray or break and is made to last you for years to come - easily rolls up and fits in your yoga mat bag or tote. Stretching straps are 1.5"W and available in 6ft, 8ft or 10ft lengths and in a variety of colors / Hand wash; Dry flat.

name: Slim Panda Yoga Strap for Stretching,Cotton Yoga Strap with Adjustable D-Ring Buckle,Non-Elastic Yoga Belt for Pilates,Gym Workouts,Physical Therapy,Improve Flexibility
short_description: Soft, Flexible: Our 100% cotton Yoga Strap offers a soft, comfortable grip that's easy to hold. Unlike stiff straps from other brands, ours is designed to support your yoga practice while being gentle on your hands and body.

Multi-Purpose: Not just for yoga, our yoga belt strap can help increase your flexibility in a wide range of physical activities, including fitness, exercise, physical therapy, stretching, balance, pilates, ballet, workout, and more.

Safe & Sturdy: With 4 mm "Welded" D-ring buckles and 2.5 mm thickness, sturdy enough to withstand heavy stretching and repeated yoga classes. Plus, the D-ring buckle is less likely to slide than rectangular buckles, ensuring your safety during use.

Adjustable: Featuring a double D-ring design, our yoga strap allows you to easily adjust the length as needed for different poses and stretches. Its versatile length makes it a useful tool for easing into a variety of poses.

Easy to Grip: Our Yoga Strap is outfitted with an extra loop on one end, providing you with plenty of grip and helping you maintain proper alignment during your practice. With a width of 1.5", it's easy to hold and control, allowing you to take your yoga practice to the next level.

name: ProsourceFit Metal D-Ring Yoga Strap 8’ Durable Cotton for Stretching and Flexibility
short_description: EASIER YOGA POSES - Assists with holding yoga poses longer and with less discom-fort as you work to increase flexibility and strength
STRETCHING ASSISTANCE - Ideal for stretching and improving mobility, helping you safely reach further than you could on your own
STURDY BUCKLE - The non-slip D-ring metal buckle is sturdier than plastic & stays securely in place for frustration-free stretching
DURABLE STRAP - Made of durable cotton with high tensile-strength weave that keeps its shape and lasts through heavy use
8-FEET LONG - 8’ x 1½” size is ideal for most people, including tall users and for those in physical therapy; Comes in 6 color options
product_description: Increase your flexibility faster and make greater strides in your yoga practice with the ProsourceFit D-Ring Yoga Strap. The 8-foot long strap is perfect for any user, even tall users who need more length with their stretching strap. It provides assistance with reaching further during stretches so you can get a deeper and more effective stretch with proper form to avoid injury. Using the yoga belt helps maintain proper form during yoga, extending your reach and making difficult poses more attainable. It allows you to stay aligned and balanced, preventing muscle strain in poses like dancer’s pose, boat pose, headstands, and hand-to-foot poses. Stability from the strap also allows you to hold those poses longer for greater strength and endurance. You can also use it for daily stretching after or between workouts to help increase range of motion, mobility and reduce pain from tight muscles. Perfect for seated or standing stretches and exercises, over-head and behind-the-back shoulder stretches, front and back of thigh stretches, and hip openers. The high-tensile weave is strong and maintains its shape while providing resistance for repeated stretches and poses. The durable D-ring metal buckle holds the strap securely and makes adjustments easy. It’s a perfect workout companion!
